objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#0B0B0F'/><path d='M0 0L1080 0L1080 1080L0 1080L0 0Z' fill='url(#paint0_linear)'/><circle cx='940' cy='140' r='180' fill='#FF3A3A' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='150' cy='950' r='230' fill='#5C2BFF' opacity='0.15'/><rect x='0' y='850' width='1080' height='230' fill='#121212'/><g opacity='0.7'><path d='M0 0L1080 0L540 400L0 0Z' fill='#FF3A3A' opacity='0.05'/><path d='M1080 0L1080 1080L680 540L1080 0Z' fill='#FF3A3A' opacity='0.05'/><path d='M1080 1080L0 1080L540 680L1080 1080Z' fill='#FF3A3A' opacity='0.05'/><path d='M0 1080L0 0L400 540L0 1080Z' fill='#FF3A3A' opacity='0.05'/></g><defs><linearGradient id='paint0_linear' x1='540' y1='0' x2='540' y2='1080' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0' stop-color='#1A1A1A'/><stop offset='1' stop-color='#000000'/></linearGradient></defs></svg>

product_details.name: Wireless Gaming Headset with Flip Microphone
product_details.description: Wireless Gaming Headset for PC, Ps5, Ps4 with Flip Microphone, by ozeino

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek and modern technology product layout. The design uses a dark gradient background enhanced with subtle geometric overlays and semi-transparent circular accents for depth. Centered prominently is a high-resolution image of a gaming headset (`product_image`), appealing to tech-savvy and gamer audiences. The bold, futuristic primary heading (`heading`) in white conveys the product name, with a smaller red subheading (`subheading`) for categorization. Pricing is clearly displayed below the product (`price`) in a bold white font. A red rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with white uppercase text (`cta`) invites immediate engagement. 

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #0B0B0F → #000000
- Red Accent: #FF3A3A
- Highlight Purple: #5C2BFF
- Text: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern gaming headset with a bold and high-contrast color palette. Predominantly black (#000000) is used to give a premium and professional look, while vibrant red accents (#FF2D2D) on the inner headband and ear cushions introduce energy and aggression, appealing to gamers. The RGB lighting on the ear cup creates a dynamic blend of colors like neon blue (#00F0FF), bright yellow (#FFF200), and vivid purple (#A347FF), giving it a high-tech, futuristic vibe. These colors are sharply defined yet seamlessly transition across the mesh, adding movement and visual interest to the product.
